text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump From an immediate shortage of coronavirus-fighting drugs to untrained staffs assisting patients, to the willingness of the administration to move 50+ infected ppl into a delapidated non-medical facility in the heart of the 18-million-ppl strong LA basin, my confidence is flagging

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
